Sequence Information.Function: Has bacteriocidal activity against both aerobic and anaerobic Gram-positive bacteria. Inhibits growth of B.subtilis (MIC="0.047" ug/ml) and methicillin-resistant S.aureus (MRSA) (MIC="0.047" ug/ml). Has poor activity against Gram-negative bacteria, with the exception of B.fragilis. Inhibits bacterial protein biosynthesis by acting on elongation factor Tu (EF-Tu). Full antibiotic activity depends on the presence of the modified residue Ile-50.

Literature.Title: Antibiotic GE37468 A: a new inhibitor of bacterial protein synthesis. I. Isolation and characterization.
Literature.Author: Colombo L.,Ferrari P.,Le Monnier F.,Montanini N.,Stella S.

Literature.Title: Antibiotic GE37468 A: a novel inhibitor of bacterial protein synthesis. II. Structure elucidation.

Literature.Title: Identification of the thiazolyl peptide GE37468 gene cluster from Streptomyces ATCC 55365 and heterologous expression in Streptomyces lividans.
Literature.Author: Walsh C.T.,Young T.S.
